attributes.action: Include Removals Porters in the groups requiring an SIA security guards licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Removals porters enter your home and pack your valuables and load them on a van a take them in to storage or to your new home. Have they got a criminal record ? are they convicted burgulars? property can be worth 10's of thousands of pounds are transported, stored by who?
